description: Developed and rebuilt a web application to support organizational work processes effectively.
achievements: Rebuilt the organization's website, transitioning from Laravel to React JS.
Improved website performance score from 49 to 84, enhancing user experience and page load speed.
Enhanced website accessibility score from 84 to 91, ensuring compliance with web accessibility standards.
Optimized and improved existing features to ensure more intuitive user flow.
Integrated farmer data with Mapbox for better geospatial visualization.
Developed a custom HRIS (Human Resource Information System) web application, replacing manual processes (e.g., docs, Excel).

description: Designed and developed user interfaces for web applications.
achievements: Created the user interface for an initial assessment application.
Integrated REST APIs provided by the backend development.
